titles.title: To provide that the prevailing party in a tort action is entitled to recover attorneys' fees from the nonprevailing party.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Entitles the prevailing party in a tort action to recover attorney's fees from the nonprevailing party, unless the court finds special circumstances that would render such an award unjust.
